p: After 2 weeks all flies (n = 47), regardless of treatment group, embedded in W. nobilis resin showed extensive preservation of cuticle and internal soft tissue. However, there were significant differences in the proportions of flies from each treatment group with internal bubbles and ruptured abdomens (p = 2.5E-7 and 1.9E-5, respectively), indicating variable decay between the treatment groups ( Fig 3, Table 2, S3 Table).
